doc.title: A to Zeppelin: The Led Zeppelin Story
doc.plot: A to Zeppelin: The 'Led Zeppelin' (qv) Story documents the colorful and outrageous history of rock's heaviest band. This unique DVD features candid interviews with long-time tour manager 'Richard Cole (II)' (qv), members of 'Yardbirds, The' (qv), Bad Company, The Ramones, Foreigner, 'Vanilla Fudge' (qv), engineer 'Andy Johns (I)' (qv), ex-girlfriends, Lori Mattix and Pamela Des Barres and more. Rare archival interview footage with 'John Bonham' (qv), 'Jimmy Page' (qv), 'Robert Plant' (qv) and manager 'Peter Grant (III)' (qv), along with rare photos spanning the "New Yardbirds" era through the breakup of 'Led Zeppelin' (qv) illustrates their fascinating story.
